=  amp-beta-0.0.1 =
== Samples With Data (SWD) ==
Getting samples with data is fairly easy. Once you create your samples and layers, use `MaxEntService` and invoke the `swd` method:

{{{
// Create a list of layers and samples:
List<Layer> layers = new ArrayList<Layer>();
layers.add(Layer.newInstance(CLIMATE, "foo", 2006, "/path/to/foo.asc"));
layers.add(Layer.newInstance(FOREST, "bar", 1977, "/path/to/bar.asc"));
List<Sample> samples = Sample.fromCsv("/path/to/samples.csv");

// Get your samples with data:
SamplesWithData swd = MaxEntService.swd(samples, layers);

// Iterate over the results:
for (Sample s : samples()) {
  for (Layer l : layers()) {
    System.out.format("%s, %s, %f", l.getName(), s.getPoint(), swd.getData(s, l)));
  }
}

// Write them to a file:
SamplesWithData.toCsv("/path/to/swd.csv");
}}}
